title: The Man who stops accidents
creator_credit: Technical and Scientific Films and Denis Ward
brief_description: Although most managements take precautions to prevent foreseeable accidents, they are still common, a very large percentage being caused by personal carelessness. In this film, the duties of the foreman in accident prevention are stressed. It goes on to show a series of “typical” accidents and “puts the clock back” on them to show how they could have been prevented.
